home_subTitle: Transform lines of code into unique web experiences.

about.title: about ME
about.p1: Graduated in Systems Engineering , in search of exciting challenges in the field of Full Stack development, with a particular focus on the Front-End. I also possess strong skills in the Back End, which allows me to comprehend and tackle projects comprehensively, from user interface design to data management in the backend.
about.p2: My goal is to contribute to the development of innovative and efficient technological solutions, leveraging my education and passion for delevopment to make an impact in the digital world.

timeLine.title: Full Stack Developer | soyHenry Bootcamp
timeLine.description: I participated in a web development bootcamp where I acquired the skills to become a Full Stack developer. During the program, I completed four comprehensive projects that covered both front-end and back-end development. Additionally, I gained valuable experience collaborating on group projects using the Scrum methodology for agile team management. I also had the opportunity to stand out by winning several web development-related competitions.

timeLine.title: Development Analyst | Incalpaca
timeLine.description: I developed programs in Genexus according to business requirements, using MySQL for daily database queries and integrating results into effective solutions. I improved functionalities in existing programs to meet commercial demands and optimize performance in production. I designed comprehensive tests to validate the proper functioning of both new and existing programs in production, ensuring their effectiveness.

timeLine.title: Analyst Programmer | De Larrobla & Asociados (DL&A)
timeLine.description: I developed programs using GeneXus, automating data exchange through SOAPUI, enhancing functionalities, and improving performance in existing programs. I also utilized AS400 for database queries. Furthermore, I provided detailed documentation of processes and enhancements in a software development environment for financial institutions, following the Scrum methodology and collaborating with international teams from various countries.

timeLine.title: Bachelor's Degree in Systems Engineering | Catholic University of Santa María.
timeLine.description: I received my academic education at the Universidad Católica de Santa María, where I graduated in Systems Engineering.

project.name: GreenLand
project.resume: E-commerce platform that provides a comprehensive experience for both buyers and administrators. Users can log in or register using their Google account or create a new account directly on the website. The app includes features such as a wishlist, a shopping cart, and the option to make payments through MercadoPago. Furthermore, it offers two types of login: one for buyer users and another for administrators. Administrators have access to an exclusive dashboard where they can manage all products, edit them, and also view information about registered users, their purchases, and sales. Users have the ability to edit their profiles and change their passwords, in addition to being able to view the details of each product for sale.
project.resume_part2: In summary, the app offers a complete online shopping experience with additional features for efficient management, both for buyers and administrators.

project.name: Portfolio
project.resume: My portfolio is a reflection of my personality, skills, and creative perspective. It showcases my notable projects and demonstrates a commitment to using pure CSS for everything, including notifications, popups, animations, and more. Throughout its development, I adhered to the best practices to deliver a product with optimal performance and presentation.
project.resume_part2: In essence, my portfolio encapsulates my professional journey, showcasing my personality, skills, creativity, and unwavering commitment to delivering excellence in web design and development.

project.name: Rick and Morty
project.resume: Represents a significant milestone in my journey as a developer, as it marked my first venture into React. This Single Page Application (SPA) taps into the 'Rick and Morty' API, offering users a dynamic platform to search, filter, and sort characters from the show. Drawing inspiration from the series' vibrant color palette and thematic elements spanning across universes and space, I infused the app with the essence of the show itself. The app's features include robust filters for alphabetical sorting, both ascending and descending, as well as filtering by character race and gender. Users can delve into detailed character information, presented in an 'ID card' format for easy access. To enhance the user experience, character data is stored in a database. For simplicity, as my initial project, I implemented basic login functionality using a predefined email and password.
project.resume_part2: In essence, my 'Rick and Morty' app is a testament to my growth as a developer and my ability to create engaging and visually appealing applications while delivering an exceptional user experience.

project.name: Pokedex
project.resume: My Pokémon app is a vibrant and engaging Single Page Application (SPA) inspired by the colorful world of the Pokémon series. It empowers users to explore, search, filter, and sort Pokémon based on their type and attack levels, all while accessing specific data through queries to a dedicated API. Drawing inspiration from the series' distinctive color palette, the app captures the essence of the Pokémon universe. It also offers a unique feature where users can design their own Pokémon, adding a creative and personal touch to the experience. To enhance user engagement and convenience, the app enables users to save their favorite Pokémon to a list, which is securely stored in a database. This feature ensures that users can revisit and interact with their selected Pokémon at any time.
project.resume_part2: In summary, my Pokémon app is a tribute to the beloved franchise, offering fans and enthusiasts a dynamic and interactive platform to explore and create their own Pokémon while providing essential search and sorting functionalities.
